EX: defense auto yellow true") echo("

and 'true' or 'false if you want to change whether it is upkept automatically.") cecho("<yellow>
EX: defense auto yellow true") echo("
This will make the defense 'yellow' upkept automatically.") cecho("<red>
BE CAREFUL WHEN CHANGING THIS, you could end up permamentally off balance!") end

Alias.name: defense

Script.name: handleList
handleGroups
Check All
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function haveSkill(checkSkill,checkAbility) if checkAbility and table.contains(hasSkill[checkSkill], checkAbility:title()) then return true else return false end end
function haveSkillset(checkSkill) if table.contains(hasSkill, checkSkill:lower()) then return true else return false end end

Script.name: Defense functions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function defenseExists(defense) if defense_list[defense] then return true else cecho("<red>Defense " .. defense .. " not found.\n") return false end end
function haveDefense(defense) if defense_list[defense] and defense_list[defense].active then return true else return false end end
function disableDefense(defense) if defenseExists(defense) then defense_list[defense].enabled = false cecho("<purple>Disabled Defense " .. defense .. "\n") myDefenses(defense, false) end end
function enableDefense(defense) if defenseExists(defense) then defense_list[defense].enabled = true cecho("<cyan>Enabled Defense " .. defense .. "\n") myDefenses(defense, true) end end
function myDefenses(defense, adding) if adding then if not table.contains(enabledDefenses, defense) then table.insert(enabledDefenses, defense) end if table.contains(disabledDefenses, defense) then table.remove(disabledDefenses, table.index_of(disabledDefenses,defense)) end else if not table.contains(disabledDefenses, defense) then table.insert(disabledDefenses, defense) end if table.contains(enabledDefenses, defense) then table.remove(enabledDefenses, table.index_of(enabledDefenses,defense)) end end end
function changeInitial(defense, init) if defenseExists(defense) then if init == "combat" or init == "hunting" or init == "all" then defense_list[defense].initial = init cecho("<yellow>Changed initial set for " .. defense .. " to " .. init .. "\n") initialDefenses[defense] = init else echo("\nIncorrect format, the keyword for initial must be all, hunting, or combat.") cecho("<yellow>\nEX: defense initial yellow hunting") echo("\nThis will make the defense 'yellow' a defense activated when hunting.") end end end
function changeAuto(defense, val) if defenseExists(defense) then if val then defense_list[defense].auto = true cecho("<blue>The defense " .. defense .. " will now upkeep automatically.\n") else defense_list[defense].auto = false cecho("<blue>The defense " .. defense .. " will no longer upkeep automatically.\n") end autoDefenses[defense] = val end end
function defensePreferences() hunting = false combat = false influencing = false enabledDefenses = enabledDefenses or {} disabledDefenses = disabledDefenses or {} initialDefenses = initialDefenses or {} autoDefenses = autoDefenses or {} table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/enables", enabledDefenses) table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/disables", disabledDefenses) table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/initials", initialDefenses) table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/autos", autoDefenses) for i,v in pairs(enabledDefenses) do enableDefense(v) end for i,v in pairs(disabledDefenses) do disableDefense(v) end for i,v in pairs(initialDefenses) do changeInitial(i,v) end for i,v in pairs(autoDefenses) do changeAuto(i,v) end end
function saveTables() table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/enables", enabledDefenses) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/disables", disabledDefenses) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/initials", initialDefenses) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/autos", autoDefenses) end
function updateDefenses(defense, adding) if adding then defense_list[defense].active = true cecho("<blue:green>\nGained Defense " .. defense) else defense_list[defense].active = false cecho("<blue:red>\nRemoved Defense " .. defense) upkeepDefenses() end end
function upkeepDefenses() for i,v in pairs(defense_list) do if v.enabled and v.auto and not v.active then if v.initial == "all" then if table.contains(v.use,"slushbalance") then table.insert(slushQueue,v.cmd) elseif table.contains(v.use,"charge") then rubDefenses(i,"sm add " .. v.cmd) elseif haveSkill(v.skill,v.name) or v.skill == "none" then if table.contains(v.req,"eq") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add " .. v.cmd) elseif combat and v.initial == "combat" then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm insert 1 " .. v.cmd) elseif hunting and v.initial == "hunting" then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm insert 1 " .. v.cmd) elseif influencing and v.initial == "influencing" then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm insert 1 " .. v.cmd) elseif v.initial == "all" then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm insert 1 " .. v.cmd) end end end end end emptyDefenseQueue() emptySlushqueue() end
function setDefenses(type) local command = "" send("sm clear") slushQueue = {} neededDefenses = {} if type == "combat" then combat = true hunting = false influencing = false elseif type == "hunting" then hunting = true combat = false influencing = false elseif type == "influencing" then influencing = true combat = false hunting = false else hunting = false influencing = false combat = false end for i,v in pairs(defense_list) do if not v.active and v.enabled then if v.initial == type or v.initial == "all" then if v.skill == "none" then if table.contains(v.req,"slushbalance") then table.insert(slushQueue,v.cmd) elseif table.contains(v.use,"charge") then rubDefenses(i,"sm add " .. v.cmd) elseif table.contains(v.use,"eq") or table.contains(v.use,"bal") then command = "sm add " .. v.cmd else command = "sm insert 1 free " .. v.cmd end elseif haveSkill(v.skill,v.name) then if table.contains(v.use,"eq") or table.contains(v.use,"bal") then command = "sm add " .. v.cmd elseif v.skill == "psionics" or v.skill == "psychometabolism" then if table.contains(v.use,"id") then useId = true else useId = false end if table.contains(v.use,"superstratus") then useSuper = true else useSuper = false end if table.contains(v.use,"substratus") then useSub = true else useSub = false end sendPsiDefenses(useId,useSub,useSuper,v.cmd) else command = "sm insert 1 free " .. v.cmd end end end end if command ~= "" then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,command) end command = "" end emptyDefenseQueue() emptySlushqueue() end
function sendPsiDefenses(useId,useSub,useSuper,cmd)
if useId and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psiid) == 1 then command = "sm add id psi id " .. cmd elseif useSub and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisub) == 1 then command = "sm add sub psi substratus " .. cmd elseif useSuper and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisuper) == 1 then command = "sm add super psi superstratus " .. cmd elseif useId and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psiid) == -1 then command = "psi id unlock;;sm add id psi id " .. cmd elseif useSub and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisub) == -1 then command = "psi substratus unlock;;sm add sub psi substratus " .. cmd elseif useSuper and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisuper) == -1 then command = "psi superstratus unlock;;sm add super psi superstratus " .. cmd end table.insert(neededDefenses,1,command) return end
function normalizeTransmology(type) for i,v in pairs(defense_list) do if type == "all" then if v.skill == "transmology" and v.active then v.active = false cecho("<blue:red>\n" .. v.name:title() .. " is natural.") end
else if v.name == type and v.active then v.active = false cecho("<blue:red>\n" .. v.name:title() .. " is natural.") end end end end
function rubDefenses(defense,cmd)
if defense == "waterbreathe" and haveSkill("elementalism","waterbreathe") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add cast waterbreathe") return elseif defense == "levitate" and haveSkill("elementalism","levitate") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add cast levitate") return elseif defense == "waterwalk" and haveSkill("cosmic","waterwalk") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add abjure waterwalk") return elseif defense == "acquisitio" and haveSkill("rituals","acquisitio") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add chant acquisitio on") return elseif defense == "nimbus" and haveSkill("cosmic","nimbus") then table.insert(neededDefenses,1,"sm add abjure nimbus") return end table.insert(neededDefenses,1,cmd .. "|recharge " .. defense .. " from cube") return end
function emptySlushqueue() if slushbalance == 1 and slushQueue[1] ~= nil and not sent_slush then sent_slush = true send("sm insert 1 " .. slushQueue[1]) tempTimer(.4, [[sent_slush = false]]) table.remove(slushQueue,1) end end
function emptyDefenseQueue() if neededDefenses[1] ~= nil then send(neededDefenses[1]) table.remove(neededDefenses,1) end end
function createDefenseDisplay() hasDefense = {} for i,v in pairs(defense_list) do if v.enabled then if haveSkill(v.skill,v.name) or v.skill == "none" or v.skill == city then if v.active then if v.skill == "transmology" then defense = "[X]" .. i else defense = "[X]".. v.name end if hasDefense[v.skill] ~= nil then table.insert(hasDefense[v.skill],defense) else hasDefense[v.skill] = {} table.insert(hasDefense[v.skill],defense) end elseif v.initial ~= "oil" and v.initial ~= "drink" and v.skill ~= "transmology" then defense = "[ ]".. v.name if v.initial ~= "city" then if hasDefense[v.skill] ~= nil then table.insert(hasDefense[v.skill],defense) else hasDefense[v.skill] = {} table.insert(hasDefense[v.skill],defense) end else if hasDefense["none"] ~= nil then table.insert(hasDefense["none"],defense) else hasDefense[v.skill] = {} table.insert(hasDefense["none"],defense) end end end end end end
for i = 1, table.size(hasDefense["none"]) do if i == 1 then table.sort(hasDefense["none"]) cecho("<yellow>General:\n") end padding = 22 - string.len(hasDefense["none"][i]) echo(hasDefense["none"][i]:title() .. string.rep(" ", padding)) if (i) % 4 == 0 then echo("\n") end end colors = {"<red>","<SteelBlue>","<chartreuse>","<medium_orchid>","<coral>","<LightGoldenrod>","<turquoise>","<forest_green>","<pink>"} for i,v in pairs(hasDefense) do if table.maxn(v) > 0 and i ~= "none" then
showDefenses(v,i,colors[1]) colors[#colors + 1] = colors[1] table.remove(colors, 1) end end end
function showDefenses(queue,name,color) for i = 1, table.size(queue) do if i == 1 then table.sort(queue) cecho("\n" .. color .. name:title() .. ":\n") end padding = 22 - string.len(queue[i]) echo(queue[i]:title() .. string.rep(" ", padding)) if (i) % 4 == 0 and table.size(queue) > 4 then echo("\n") end
end end
function pauseDefenses() neededDefenses = {} slushQueue = {} send("sm clear") end
--Clear on death/class switch function clearDefenses() for i,v in pairs(defense_list) do v.active = false end neededDefenses = {} slushQueue = {} hasDefense = {} end

Script.name: Enable/Disable skills
Script.script:
function enableSkills() for _, v in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups) do enableAlias(v.name:title()) enableTrigger(v.name:title()) end
end
function disableSkills() for _, v in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups) do disableAlias(v.name:title()) disableTrigger(v.name:title()) end end

Script.name: vitals_function
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function vitals_function() checkdeaf = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.deaf) checkblind = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.blind) power = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.pow) slushbalance = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.slush) steambalance = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.steam) dustbalance = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.dust) icebalance = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ice) scrollbalance = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.scroll) psisub = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisub) psiid = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psiid) psisuper = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.psisuper) kafe = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.kafe) end
